mapper.select: select t1.id , t1.provider_code , t1.interface_no , t1.validate_state , t1.create_time , t1.create_by , t1.modify_time , t1.modify_by from ext_provider_interface_ref t1 where t1.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update ext_provider_interface_ref t1 set t1.provider_code =#{dto.providerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.interface_no =#{dto.interfaceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.validate_state ='1', t1.modify_time =systimestamp, t1.modify_by =#{dto.modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where t1.id = #{dto.id}
mapper.delete: delete from ext_provider_interface_ref t1 where t1.ID in (${ids} )
mapper.update: update ext_provider_interface_ref t1 set t1.validate_state='0' where t1.id in( ${ids})
mapper.delete: delete from ext_provider_interface_ref t1 where t1.provider_code =#{providerCode}
